casebody.data:
Fletcher H. HANSON et al., Appellants, v. The CHESAPEAKE AND OHIO RAILWAY COMPANY, a corporation, Appellee. No. 9962. United States Court of Appeals Fourth Circuit. Argued Nov. 2, 1965. Decided Nov. 4, 1965. Robert O.. Ellis, Huntington, W. Va., for appellants. Edwin W. Conley, Huntington, W. Va. (Huddleston & Bolen, Huntington, W. Va., on brief), for appellee.

Before BOREMAN, BRYAN and J. SPENCER BELL, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Upon consideration of the briefs, oral argument and entire record, we find no error.

Affirmed.
